title: Indera Men's Traditional Waffle Thermal Long Johns Underwear
description: Reliable Heat Retention: Made of cozy waffle-knit fabric, our long johns for men trap and retain body heat within the waffle pockets
Soft Cotton-Poly Construction: Our men’s long underwear is constructed of a comfortable cotton blend enhanced with polyester for added stability and utility
Comfort-Driven Design: The ultimate long underwear, our men's thermal underwear features ribbed cuffs that help keep the cold out; A front fly enhances functionality
Combats Cold Conditions: Our men’s long johns help you weather cold to very cold conditions during medium-level activities like hiking, camping, and even lounging
Versatile Sizing: Our thermal leggings are available in sizes up to 6X
5 oz, Waffle Knit Traditional Long Johns offer familiar, cotton rich comfort
